name: Eventat
overview:
Eventat is a self-service event management and online registration solution that helps event organizers successfully manage and sell out their events.

For event organizers, posting an event on Eventat is always free. Organizers can sell tickets, manage attendees, and collect payment for their events, amongst other tools. They can collect payment for their events through various third-party payment services, including PayPal and Google Checkout. For larger event organizers who own an Authorize.net merchant account, you can collect direct credit card payments using Authorize.net at no additional cost.

For event attendees, Eventat includes the ability to interact with one another via comments, shared photos, and shared videos. The company’s post-event feedback system offers attendees the opportunity to leave organizers a comment and a rating for events that they have attended. This gives Eventat members the opportunity to build a strong network of event organizers and events to choose from.

Eventat does not currently charge a per-ticket-fee for paid events.
